solution_line_template: She had bought {candies_tuesday}+{candies_thursday}+{candies_friday} = <<{candies_tuesday}+{candies_thursday}+{candies_friday}={total_bought}>>{total_bought} candies over the week
She has only {candies_left} left which means she ate {total_bought}-{candies_left} = <<{total_bought}-{candies_left}={candies_eaten}>>{candies_eaten} candies during the week
